--------------------------------------
Joomla\\CMS\\Document\\Feed\\FeedImage
--------------------------------------

.. php:namespace: Joomla\\CMS\\Document\\Feed

.. php:class:: FeedImage

    Data object representing a feed image

    .. php:attr:: title

        :type: string

        Title image attribute

        required

    .. php:attr:: url

        :type: string

        URL image attribute

        required

    .. php:attr:: link

        :type: string

        Link image attribute

        required

    .. php:attr:: width

        :type: string

        Width image attribute

        optional

    .. php:attr:: height

        :type: string

        Title feed attribute

        optional

    .. php:attr:: description

        :type: string

        Title feed attribute

        optional
